name: These Four Walls
description:
During quarantine, a lot of people’s worlds shrunk to just four walls. Using an AR device, see that there’s more to your world than meets the eye. Manipulate the environment to make your small room seem big for a miniature you. These Four Walls is about perspective, loneliness, and learning how to reach out to others when you can’t do it on your own.

Submission for VR Jam 2021 (https://itch.io/jam/vr-jam-2021). 

Game Details

Topic: Small World

Time Limit: 60 hours

Engine: Unity 2021.1

Team Size: 4

Assets Used: 

AutoHand (VR Hands and Interactions)

Hyper-Casual Character Stickman sphere head (AR Character)

AllSkyFree (Skybox)

Aura 2 (Lighting)

Sci Fi Hologram Shader

Quest Markers 3D (AR Game Destination Markers)

3D Games Effects Pack Free (Fireworks)
